title: Sarah Richardson 6-Pod Drop Necklace
description:
The 6 Pod Drop Necklace is hand carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. Each piece is heated to a bright white sterling, with a high polished edge. Sarah Richardson’s collection ranges from everyday simple to extraordinary. The organic nature of her jewelry finds balance and symmetry through repetition. Each piece is finely crafted in California using traditional metalsmithing techniques in precious metals.

Pods vary in size, up to 0.33 in. D.

Sterling chain is 17 in. L.

  • Dimensions: .5 x .25 x 16 in. 
  • Materials: sterling silver
  • Care Instructions:  Sterling silver can tarnish due to exposure to oxygen. When not worn, jewelry is best stored in an air-tight container. To clean jewelry, first wash all oils and debris from jewelry using warm/hot water, dish soap, and an old soft toothbrush, then dry jewelry.
